19th International Conference on Natural Language Processing

December 15th - 18th, 2022  |  IIIT Delhi, India

►Paper submission deadlines are further extended to October 9, 2022 due to the festive season. ►We are glad to announce our keynote speakers.

Welcome to ICON 2022!

The nineteenth International Conference on Natural Language Processing (ICON-2022) will be held at IIIT Delhi, India during December 15-18, 2022. The ICON Conference series is a forum for promoting interaction among researchers in the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Computational Linguistics (CL) in India and abroad. The main conference is on December 16-17, 2022. This will be preceded by one day of pre-conference tutorials / workshops on December 15, 2022 and one day of post conference shared tasks / tools / demos on December 18, 2022.

News

  • Paper and Doctoral Consortium submission deadlines have been further extended to October 9, 2022 due to the festive season.
  • Paper and Doctoral Consortium submission deadlines have been extended to October 2, 2022.
  • Workshop proposal deadline has been extended to September 30, 2022.
  • Privileged to host keynote speakers. Visit keynote speakers
  • Call for Papers, Tutorials and Workshop released. Visit calls

Important Dates

  • (Further Extended) Paper Submission Deadline:   Sep 25, 2022   Oct 9, 2022
  • (Further Extended) Doctoral Consortium Deadline:   Sep 25, 2022   Oct 9, 2022
  • (Extended) Workshop Proposals Deadline:   Sep 15, 2022   Sep 30, 2022
  • Workshop Acceptance Notification:   Sep 30, 2022   Oct 15, 2022
  • Tutorial Proposals Deadline:   Oct 15, 2022
  • Shared-task and Tool contest Proposals Deadline:   Oct 15, 2022
  • Tutorial Acceptance Notification:   Oct 30, 2022
  • Shared-task and Tool contest Acceptance Notification:   Oct 30, 2022
  • Paper (Main and Doctoral Consortium) Acceptance Notification:   Nov 15, 2022
  • Camera-ready Submission Deadline:   Dec 01, 2022
  • Conference:   Dec 15 - 18, 2022
    • Pre-conference Tutorial / Workshop:   Dec 15, 2022
    • Main Program:   Dec 16 - 17, 2022
    • Post-conference Tutorial / Workshop:   Dec 18, 2022

All deadlines are 11:59:59 PM IST (GMT +5:30).
